pdover2t.pipe.pipe_props¶

  • pipe_radial_dimensions

  • pipe_cs_area

  • Di_from_pipe_Do

pipe_radial_dimensions¶

pdover2t.pipe.pipe_props.pipe_radial_dimensions(*, Do=None, Di=None, WT=None)[source]¶

Resolve pipe radial dimensions. Given two of three dimensional arguments outer diameter Do; inner diameter Di; wall thickness WT; calculate the missing dimension and return a tuple (Do, Di, WT).

If all arguments are specified a consistency check is carried out, and an AssertionError is raised if the dimensions are inconsistent.

Parameters

  • Do – pipe outer diameter \((D_o)\)

  • Di – pipe inner diameter \((D_i)\)

  • WT (float) – pipe wall thickness \((WT)\)

Returns

outer diameter, inner diameter, wall thickness

Return type

tuple

>>> pipe_radial_dimensions(Do=0.660, WT=0.05)
(0.66, 0.56, 0.05)

pipe_cs_area¶

pdover2t.pipe.pipe_props.pipe_cs_area(*, Do=None, Di=None, WT=None)[source]¶

Calculate pipe cross sectional area by specifying at least two of the three dimensional arguments outer diameter Do, inner diameter Di, wall thickness WT.

Parameters

  • Do – pipe outer diameter \((D_o)\)

  • Di – pipe inner diameter \((D_i)\)

  • WT (float) – pipe wall thickness \((WT)\)

Returns

pipe cross sectional area

Return type

float

>>> pipe_cs_area(Do=0.660, WT=0.05)
0.09581857593448868

Di_from_pipe_Do¶

pdover2t.pipe.pipe_props.Di_from_pipe_Do(Do, WT)[source]¶

Calculate pipe inner diameter (Di), given a reference outer diameter (Do) and a wall thickness dimension (WT). WT can be a list or tuple of wall thicknesses for compound section pipes.

\[D_i = D_o - 2 * WT\]
Parameters

  • Do – pipe outer diameter \((D_o)\)

  • WT (float, list, tuple) – pipe wall thickness, or list/tuple of wall thicknesses

Returns

pipe inner diameter \((D_i)\)

Return type

float

>>> Di_from_pipe_Do(203.2, 3.0)
197.2

Do_from_pipe_Di¶

pdover2t.pipe.pipe_props.Do_from_pipe_Di(Di, WT)[source]¶

Calculate pipe outer diameter (Do), given a reference inner diameter (Di) and a wall thickness dimension (WT). WT can be a list or tuple of wall thicknesses for compound section pipes.

\[D_o = D_i + 2 * WT\]
Parameters

  • Di – pipe inner diameter \((D_i)\)

  • WT (float, list, tuple) – pipe wall thickness, or list/tuple of wall thicknesses

Returns

pipe outer diameter \((D_o)\)

Return type

float

>>> Do_from_pipe_Di(0.660, 0.045)
0.75
>>> Do_from_pipe_Di(203.2, [3, 45, 5])
309.2
